title: Really liking the Banning quotes in the new client!
body:
https://youtu.be/Pnm3Kc0p9fQ?t=30

Characters will now each have a line they say when they are banned. Please keep this in riot! Really gives some more character to the game, very enjoyable.

replies.body: Zed: Crap, not again...

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YxEzfwpa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-04T18:48:20.605+0000)
>
> Zed: Crap, not again...

Zed: They are gonna say that overused shit again
LMAO
Wait... what would Morde say?!
If it's not "How delightfully painful" or "So be it, Summoner" I'm gonna be so disappointed.

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YxEzfwpa,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-08-04T19:58:15.531+0000)
>
> If it's not "How delightfully painful" or "So be it, Summoner" I'm gonna be so disappointed.

Could be "You fool!" or "Misery loves company."
summoners are gone though
The IoW is gone, we are still summoners, we just arnt canonically in the game anymore
So we exist, but at the same time we just don't exist anymore. Makes sense.
We exist as players, just not in Runeterra
I think a simple "Fool." would suffice quite nicely. It would push his general feeling of disdain and lack of interest.

Well, in the end it wouldn't really matter.
I wouldn't want to hear his ban quote in my ranked games anyways D:

"Well, in the end it wouldn't really matter."
I like this for a Morde ban quote XD. Just imagine him saying it with some finality.

I just want to hear Sion's. If it is not just him screaming ["COWARDS!"](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/9/95/Sion.R8.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20140927044435) I will be very disappointed.
You only have to click once :(

This is awesome, please leave it, Riot. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I wish you'd also put back the Lock-in quotes where everyone can hear them; it was pretty cool.
They said on reddit they would do so, when they recorded the video there was a bug.
Heyyyyyy folks! For those wondering about champion pick lines on lock in, they are coming :) The video above doesn't have it yet, but rest assured, ye shall have it. :D
THANKS!!!
What would Sona say?
"well shit."
*Random etwahl sounds*
Just her hitting etwahl unceremoniously.
Same. This was my favorite part lol. I love Zed's and I'm curious to know what all the other champs say.
Kled: Goddammit!

*bans Kled*
Kled: I WILL MURDER YOUR WHOLE FAMILY!
i agree, bring back ALL the voices even when the champions are picked. it made champ select so awesome

{{champion:45}} ["I can see the fear in your heart!"](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/ff/Veigar.attack5.ogg/revision/latest?cb=20121127014703)

This one seems the most appropriate.
Also "you deny the darkness in your soul!" Could work
{{champion:32}} quote: yay, someone noticed me ;__;

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YxEzfwpa,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2016-08-04T22:26:47.491+0000)
>
> {{champion:32}} quote: yay, someone noticed me ;__;

I was thinking more like "I got picked? Awesome! Oh, wait..."

Yasuo: No cure for fools.

No cure for the boards either.
Are these quotes unique or they are using taunt/ joke quotes?

For all the champs before Taliyah, they're chosen from existing voice-over lines, and we've tried to choose tasteful ones that make sense for a ban. From Taliyah on out however, we're writing specific ban lines! Let that hilarity ensue!

Please tell me theres some way to get Master Yi to scream 
"I WAS IN ALPHA"
{{champion:33}} "OK... Fuck you too then"
I have someone sleeping next to me and this made me laugh really hard. I hate you.
Now why can't they have the Pick Lines again? Those were actually really neat, too! 'Specially with the sound effect at the beginning.

{{champion:203}} "Those who dread us grant us the most power."

Hoping for this one. Although for length reasons, they'll probably go with a Wolf quote. "How fast can you run?"
Diana better say "Ignorant thralls!"
Ban {{champion:11}} : Your Skills are Inferiah!
It's gonna be so sad when amumu gets banned tho...
Agreed, this is great

Jhin: My critics are usually short lived! 

That would be awesome ^^

Huh, I was under the impression that they're not doing move VO work with some champions because of the difficulty getting the actors back for more lines.  I'd be curious how they got around this to bring everyone back for literally 1 line.

Unless these are all older lines being re-used, and I just don't pay enough attention to recognize them.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Dienekes,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=YxEzfwpa,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-08-04T20:31:28.166+0000)
>
> Huh, I was under the impression that they're not doing move VO work with some champions because of the difficulty getting the actors back for more lines.  I'd be curious how they got around this to bring everyone back for literally 1 line.
> 
> Unless these are all older lines being re-used, and I just don't pay enough attention to recognize them.

They're parts of their typical dialog. I've heard "Draven Out" when he recalls, and Ryze's "FINE" is from issuing a move command in game.

I'm a little sad they aren't more arrogant. Like 

"you were right to ban me"

or 

"wise move"
New champs are probably definitely gonna have lines for getting banned but right now they only have the current VO to work with.
